title: La Tomatina
description: A game inspired by the Tomatina Festival, in Spain, where the player must hit the others with tomatoes and not get hit. La Tomatina is a full front-end, desktop-only designed, project, built as the module 1 project for Ironhack's Web Development Bootcamp.

title: FilMate
description: A social media platform for people who like watching movies. FilMate is a full stack, desktop-only designed, project, more focused on the back-end architecture, built as the module 2 project for Ironhack's Web Development Bootcamp.

title: Pet Log
description: Pet Log is a mobile-first app, created to help pet owners manage their pets' life. Users can create a profile for each of their pets, and store important information about them. Pet Log is a full MERN stack application, and the final project of Ironhack's Web Development Bootcamp.

title: Jogas com Ética?
description: Ética no Desporto is a project build for the Portuguese Fencing Federation, that aims to spread and approach ethics in sports within the fencing community. The app built is a 10-question quizz, which delivers a profile to the user at the end, as the result.

title: Hermes Protocol
description: The first notification & communication platform for any on-chain (web3) alerts delivered on social media, reducing the Fear Of Missing Out (FOMO) so intrinsic to that market. A product of Momentum One.
